headline: Expedia Group to Webcast First Quarter 2025 Results on May 8, 2025
summary: SEATTLE, April 02, 2025--Expedia Group (NASDAQ: EXPE) will report its first quarter 2025 results for the period ended March 31, 2025, on Thursday, May 8, 2025 via an earnings release and accompanying webcast. These items will be available in the Investor Relations section of the company’s corporate website at http://ir.expediagroup.com. The earnings release will post after market close and the webcast will begin at 1:30 PM Pacific Time / 4:30 PM Eastern Time. A replay of the call is expected to

headline: Here’s What Helped Expedia Group (EXPE) to Grow Its Market Share
summary: River Road Asset Management, an investment management company released its “River Road Mid Cap Value Fund” Q4 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the fourth quarter, AMG River Road Small Cap Value Fund (Class N) returned 2.97% compared to -1.75% returns for the Russell MidCap Value Index. For […]
